page.title: 08Population, politics, law
page.content:
912 inhabitants, of which 431 are male, 481 female. About 25% are of retirement age and 7% preschool age. 25 persons were born in other parts of the United Kingdom and 12 in other parts of the world. The registrars for births, marriages and deaths are at Tarleton, Chorley and Ormskirk.
This is a predominantly Conservative area, voting taking place at Tarleton and Chorley.
Police stations are situated at Rufford, Chorley and Croston (average five miles), with a good liaison with the local patrolling policemen.
